## How to add the crayfish image:

1. Download a cute crayfish/lobster PNG image from one of these free sources:
   - [Lovepik - Cute Crayfish PNG](https://lovepik.com/images/png-cute-crayfish.html)
   - [Vecteezy - Cute Lobster PNGs](https://www.vecteezy.com/free-png/cute-lobster)
   - [PNGTree - Cartoon Crayfish](https://pngtree.com/freepng/cartoon-crayfish_2589198.html)
   - [Freepik - Lobster PNG](https://www.freepik.com/free-photos-vectors/lobster-png)

2. Save it as `crayfish.png` in this directory

3. The README will automatically display your chosen image!
